FILE: cm816820v11.0.txt
DYAD: N. VIETNAM - MALAYSIA
RIVALRY: RIV1360
DISPUTE(S): MID3616 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170521
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170521

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3616

TERRMID: MID3616 3 -- not territorial 
TERRMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3616 3 -- not third party linked to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES:

MARITMID: MID3616 1 -- maritime dispute 
MARITMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID3616 Occupation of Terumbu Layang-Layang occurs to bolster the strength of maritime claims in the area. 

ISLMID: MID3616 1 -- islands MID
ISLMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: MID3616 Malaysia used commandoes to occupy Terumbu Layang-Layang (i.e. Swallow Island) on 4 Sep. 1983. This is an atoll in the Spratlys. Vietnam protests on 7 September. The dispute ends exactly 6 mo. after the occupation, suggesting that the occupation is the main event. 

CIVWARMID: MID3616 3 -- not civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARLINK: MID3616 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3616 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3616 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:
Singh, Bilveer. 1998. China, the South China Sea, and the Security of Post-Cold War Southeast Asia. In Columbus, Frank (ed), Asian Economic and Political Issues, Vol 1. Commack, NY: Nova Science. "Malaysia was the last country to militarise its South China Sea claims. On 4 September 1983, Malaysia sent about 20 commandos to Terumbu Layang-Layang (p. 20).“

Salleh, Asri, Che Hamden Che Mohd Razali, and Kamaruzaman Jusoff. 2009. Malaysia’s Policy Towards its 1963-2008 Territorial Disputes. Journal of Law and Conflict Resolution. 1(5):107-116. Retrieved online 3/7/2017 from: http://www.academicjournals.org/journal/JLCR/article-full-text-pdf/7DC4D687629

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:
Trao, Nguyen Hong. 1997. "Vietnam's First Boundary Agreement." IBRU Boundary and Security Bulletin, Autumn 1997. See MID documentation. 

Trumbull, Robert. 1983. "5 Countries Vying Over an Asian Archipelago." New York Times 8/28/1983, accessed via ProQuest. See MID documentation.
